float: none; position: absolute; top: 0px; right: auto; bottom: auto; left: 0px; margin: 0px; width: 10540px; height: 617px; opacity: 0.347633;\"><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4351 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wendy-westerwelle-150x150.png\" alt=\"wendy westerwelle drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wendy-westerwelle-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wendy-westerwelle.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wendy-westerwelle-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/wendy-westerwelle-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p><b>I’ve been teaching for over 35 years </b>and the Drama Notebook curriculum is a gift beyond measure. It is inspiring to have so much material at my fingertips especially when I occasionally run out of steam. I can find something for any age or any background while ensuring that my student’s experiences are fruitful and rewarding. There are tons of original activities that don’t speak down to kids, but empower them while promoting individual growth and creativity. This curriculum rocks!!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 14pt;\"><span style=\"font-size: 18pt;\">Wendy Westwerwelle</span> </span><br>\nDrama Teacher and Award Winning Actress</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4344 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nikee-weber-150x150.png\" alt=\"nikee weber drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nikee-weber-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nikee-weber.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nikee-weber-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/nikee-weber-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I no longer have to scour books, </b>and search online to find the materials I need. It has all been provided for me in an easy to use format. If I need to inspire a group of kids to create a five minute play, I know I can find the right activity in minutes!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Nikee Weber</span><br>\nFormer Disney Character Actor and Teaching Artist</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4352 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/whitney-johnson-150x150.png\" alt=\"whitney johnson drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/whitney-johnson-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/whitney-johnson.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/whitney-johnson-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/whitney-johnson-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I love your site! </b>I find it to be extremely helpful, concise, and full of great advice, fun activities, and plenty of resources for any in class activity. I’ve been teaching and directing children’s theater in Portland for the past four years and I can’t believe I’m just finding you now! Thank you for providing such a great resource for teachers everywhere!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Whitney Johnson</span><br>\nTeaching Artist, Village Home School</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4336 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/adrienne-olmstead-150x150.png\" alt=\"adrienne olmstead drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/adrienne-olmstead-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/adrienne-olmstead.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/adrienne-olmstead-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/adrienne-olmstead-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><strong>I am a middle school drama teacher </strong>and Drama Notebook has been such a life and time saver! All the resources and activities match perfectly with my curriculum for my Acting, Intro to Drama, Theatre Arts, and Improvisation classes! The print and play games are great because they save the time of making the lists-they are ready to go. I love how there always new things to explore, especially the new monologue section! The Facebook page has also been a wonderful new addition–as I check the updates, new ideas are always keeping things fresh. Thanks to Janea and Drama Notebook for making my life easier as a drama teacher and my lessons creative and inspiring!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Adrienne Olmstead</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4340 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chris-Fitzgerald-150x150.png\" alt=\"Chris Fitzgerald Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chris-Fitzgerald-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chris-Fitzgerald.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chris-Fitzgerald-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Chris-Fitzgerald-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I’ve been an actor for over 30 </b>years and over the last 2 years I’ve been working with a youth theatre for kids between the ages of 15 and 18. Janea’s personal recommendations to me were really helpful and I felt a lot more secure working with the kids. Her advice, along with the amazing material on this website allows me to have confidence in the lesson plans that I prepare.</p>\n<p class=\"name\"><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Chris Fitzgerald</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4338 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Amy-LaRosa-Peters-150x150.png\" alt=\"Amy LaRosa Peters Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Amy-LaRosa-Peters-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Amy-LaRosa-Peters.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Amy-LaRosa-Peters-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Amy-LaRosa-Peters-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>Even with sixteen years of experience </b>teaching drama, I constantly find new games and curriculum in the Drama Notebook! It’s an amazingly comprehensive and creative collection of theater activities to use in the classroom or even at home with my own kids!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Amy LaRosa Peters</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4346 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Ronda-150x150.png\" alt=\"Ronda Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Ronda-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Ronda.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Ronda-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Ronda-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>Friday I was asked to begin an after-school drama club </b>starting on Monday. I was stressed out, because I want this to be an awesome experience for the kids, as well as me. All worries are gone now that I found this site and all the resources! THANK YOU for sharing!! Now I cannot wait to begin, I feel so prepared.</p>\n<p class=\"name\"><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Ronda Hall</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4350 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stephanie-Bastin-150x150.png\" alt=\"Stephanie Bastin Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stephanie-Bastin-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stephanie-Bastin.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stephanie-Bastin-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stephanie-Bastin-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I love my Drama Notebook subscription! </b>Out of all of the dozens of books and resources I have collected over the years, it always seems that the games and lessons that come from the Drama Notebook are the biggest hits with the students! I will continue to be loyal subscriber as long as I teach Drama!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Stephanie Bastin</span><br>\nDrama Teacher/Director<br>\nFriendship Christian School<br>\nLebanon, TN</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4341 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Di-Burnett-150x150.png\" alt=\"Di Burnett Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>This is the most inspiring drama site that I have ever found. </b>I have been teaching drama workshops for the past twenty years and created much of my own material. But sometimes you just feel uninspired and lacking in new ideas. Thanks to this site, that should never happen again. Many thanks.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Di Burnett</span><br>\nYouth and Community Drama</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4349 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stepanie-Merrow-150x150.png\" alt=\"Stepanie Merrow Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stepanie-Merrow-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stepanie-Merrow.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stepanie-Merrow-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Stepanie-Merrow-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>Drama Notebook curriculum has been </b> to my career. I have been teaching/directing drama for 13 years, and while I have a lot of teaching ideas, I was feeling burned out on some of it. I really needed a refresher for my bag of tricks. This curriculum was just the ticket. It’s easy to understand and teach, and the prepared cut-out ideas are fantastic!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Stephanie Merrow </span><br>\nActress, Teaching Artist</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4342 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Jennifer-Kenny-150x150.png\" alt=\"Jennifer Kenny Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Jennifer-Kenny-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Jennifer-Kenny.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Jennifer-Kenny-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Jennifer-Kenny-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I am truly enjoying this website </b>and finding it to be one of the most helpful tools I have as a drama teacher. The author of the site is amazing. When I needed extra information on a topic, she sent me personal insights that were helpful and much appreciated.</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Jennifer Kenny</span><br>\nDrama Coach, Fairfield CT</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4347 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Sally-Rodriguez-150x150.png\" alt=\"Sally Rodriguez Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Sally-Rodriguez-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Sally-Rodriguez.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Sally-Rodriguez-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/Sally-Rodriguez-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I have been teaching </b>Creative Drama for three years to preschoolers and 6-9 year olds, with no formal training, relying on my own thought up lessons plans and finding my way…. sometimes successfully, sometimes not! In a moment of desperation for new inspiration, I decided to turn to my faithful friend Google again. Although this time, to my surprise, Drama Notebook popped up! WOW! Finally a website sharing REAL lesson plans! Not just a few but 100’s of ideas! THANK you, thank you Drama Notebook for changing my life!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Sally Rodriquez</span><br>\nThe Drama Box, Cape Town, South Africa</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4345 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/paula-mcgowan-150x150.png\" alt=\"paula mcgowan drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/paula-mcgowan-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/paula-mcgowan.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/paula-mcgowan-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/paula-mcgowan-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>Thank you Janea </b>for providing us with Drama Notebook! I run an after school drama club called POCKET MONEY WORKSHOP for 5-15 year-olds just outside Manchester, UK and I find your site an invaluable resource. I stumbled across DN whilst researching ideas for my classes, but thanks to you, I no longer have to trawl through pages and pages of information to find appropriate material. Everything – and so much more besides – is there in a ‘click’. Love it!</p>\n<p class=\"name\"><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Paula McGowan</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4343 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/mohamed-el-ashiry-150x150.png\" alt=\"mohamed el-ashiry drama teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/mohamed-el-ashiry-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/mohamed-el-ashiry.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/mohamed-el-ashiry-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/mohamed-el-ashiry-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>Drama Notebook has really helped me </b>become a more efficient and organized drama teacher! Before I became a member, it was always hard finding appropriate games and ideas for my classes, but this website gathers them all and categorizes them all in the one place! It really has been a great help and an inspiration for many of my lessons and learning activities! Thank you Drama Notebook <img draggable=\"false\" class=\"emoji\" alt=\"🙂\" src=\"https://s.w.org/images/core/emoji/2.2.1/svg/1f642.svg\"></p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Mohamed El-Ashiry</span><br>\nDrama teacher from Melbourne, Australia</p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li><li class=\"col span_4\" style=\"width: 290px;\">\n\t<div class=\"wpb_text_column wpb_content_element \">\n\t\t<div class=\"wpb_wrapper\">\n\t\t\t<p><img class=\"aligncenter wp-image-4348 size-thumbnail\" src=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/sharon-Renberg-150x150.png\" alt=\"sharon Renberg Drama Teacher\" width=\"150\" height=\"150\" srcset=\"https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/sharon-Renberg-150x150.png 150w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/sharon-Renberg.png 300w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/sharon-Renberg-50x50.png 50w, https://www.dramanotebook.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/04/sharon-Renberg-100x100.png 100w\" sizes=\"(max-width: 150px) 100vw, 150px\"></p>\n<p style=\"font-size: 14px;\"><b>I led a Drama camp </b>at my church for a week last summer. Your Drama Notebook resources were so valuable to me. I used many of the drama games from your website. The kids had a blast! One of their homework assignments was to create a character complete with costume and a short monologue. It was very entertaining! Our week of Drama Camp ended with the children leading our evening worship service. I was like a proud mama! Thank you for the resources given in the Drama Notebook. It is a well organized resource and I found it extremely helpful!!!</p>\n<p><span style=\"font-family: 'SF Grunge Sans'; font-size: 18pt;\">Sha Rehberg</span></p>\n\n\t\t</div>\n\t</div>\n</li></ul></div></div></div>\n\t\t\t</div> \n\t\t</div>\n\t</div> \n</div></div>\n\t<div id=\"fws_58fd22c15cddb\" data-midnight=\"dark\" data-bg-mobile-hidden=\"\" class=\"wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row standard_section   \" style=\"padding-top: 0px;
